main.name: Oseghale Ehichioya Israel
main.description: Highly motivated and results-oriented DevOps and Cloud Engineer with 4+ years of experience designing, implementing, building CI/CD pipelines and managing cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure platforms. Proven ability to optimize performance, automate deployments, and ensure security best practices. Skilled in troubleshooting and resolving cloud-related issues. Eager to leverage expertise to contribute to a fast-paced cloud environment.
